reviews.review_msg: Prof O'Brien is a prof who (1) knows TONS re: her area of expertise and beyond, (2) is VERY passionate about what she teaches, (3) unpacks the material with the class/individual amazingly, (4) is very precise in what she looks for in her assignments. Fantastic prof -- she makes you want to work hard and she'll definitely recognize it!

Amazing professor - my favorite at SFU. She is passionate about what she teaches, kind, helpful and tries hard to be available for her students outside of the classroom. If you are interested in the subject that she teaches, willing to work hard and you like talking in class, you will enjoy her classes.
